person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Every year , 500 new plastic surgeons graduate in Brazil and medical students from all over the world come to study there .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| 500 new plastic surgeons |
| medical students |
| plastic surgeons |
| medical students from all over the world |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| 500 new plastic surgeons |
| medical students |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Person":

* "plastic surgeons" (this refers to a profession, not a person)
* "medical students from all over the world" (this refers to a group of people, not a single person)
